artist: Artist: Norman Catherine; Printer: Broederstroom Press, Johannesburg, South Africa
creditline: Gift of Wilma and Don Piccard
description: head and shoulders of a man wearing a yellow shirt and black suspenders, with head upraised, mouth open and eyes closed; blue and green skin; green lips; brick wall topped with orange cones in background; blue sky with green and white "x," ULC
provenance: Acquired from the artist by Wilma and Don Piccard, Minneapolis; their gift to the MIA, 2004.
title: Walls Without Clouds
